message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, $14,000 is closer to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $11,500, which is as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
